dublin_core.dcvalue: Today mobile computing provides enough resources to be used in medical applications Patient treatment is a process that involves multiple partners All those partners need access to common patient data and need to make changes to the patients health record Therefore data that the partners collect and change with mobile devices has to be synchronized on a central server to form the master patient record Data conflicts resulting from the synchronization have to be solved automatically Our project describes a solution for XML based data replication and synchronization for mobile health applications
XML-based synchronization of mobile medical devices.
